attributes.action: Work towards the recreation of the state of Palestine. A one - state solution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A grave error was commited when israel was created in 1947. The World was sympathetic to the Jews plight following the Holocaust but the situation of the Palestinian arabs was ignored.
A two-state solution to the Israel/Palestine problem can only be an interim solution. The refugees in Gaza have been displaced from Haifa, Tel Aviv, Jaffa etc. and they want their land back!
